description:
System information and configuration for the Bytebase instance.
 Actuator concept is similar to the Spring Boot Actuator.

activatedInstanceCount.description: The number of activated database instances.

demo.description: Whether the Bytebase instance is running in demo mode.

disallowPasswordSignin.description: Whether password-based signin is disabled (except for workspace admins).

disallowSignup.description: Whether self-service user signup is disabled.

docker.description: Whether the Bytebase instance is running in Docker.

enableSample.description: Whether sample data setup is enabled.

externalUrl.description: The external URL where users or webhook callbacks access Bytebase.

externalUrlFromFlag.description: Whether the external URL is set via command-line flag (and thus cannot be changed via UI).

gitCommit.description: The git commit hash of the build.

host.description: The host address of the Bytebase instance.

lastActiveTime.description: The last time any API call was made, refreshed on each request.

needAdminSetup.description: Whether the Bytebase instance requires initial admin setup.

port.description: The port number of the Bytebase instance.

readonly.description: Whether the Bytebase instance is running in read-only mode.

require2fa.description: Whether two-factor authentication is required for all users.

saas.description: Whether the Bytebase instance is running in SaaS mode where some features cannot be edited by users.

totalInstanceCount.description: The total number of database instances.

unlicensedFeatures.description: List of features that are not licensed.

userStats.description: Statistics about users in the system.

workspaceId.description: The unique identifier for the workspace.

title: Actuator Info
